Class PropertyDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.core.beans.PropertyDescriptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Named
    Deprecated. 
    Use BeanProperty instead

    @Deprecated
public class PropertyDescriptor
extends Object
implements Named
    An interface that provides basic bean information. Designed as a simpler replacement for PropertyDescriptor.

    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
